long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Completely hide emojis from a twitch chat by their user identifier. 

FAQ:
- What's an User Identifier? 
The user identifier goes from the start of the emoji name to the number, though some emojis may contain multiple numbers (include all of them!). You don't want to include the actual "name" of the emoji, such as wave, smug, or yippee. 

Example of a User Identifier: shaybu4
